item.title: 2021 Year in Books
item.description: Top 10 The Secret Life of Groceries The Office of Historical Corrections Convenience Store Woman Lurking Goodbye, again Detransition, Baby The Anthropocene Reviewed The Joy of Being Selfish Steal like an Artist Cook Real Hawaii The Ocean at the End of the Lane The Secret Life of Groceries I took months to finish this book â€” Not because it was a slog, but because I enjoyed it too much and didn’t want to binge it all in one go!
